Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification: N-terminal Cys is carboxymethylated.Activity: Active against S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. aureus ATCC 6238 or MRSA ATCC 831 or ATCC839, or ATCC 33591 (MIC 32 ug/ml), E. faecium ATCC 19434 or ATCC 51559 (MIC 64 ug/ml), and E. faecalis ATCC 51259 (MIC 64 ug/ml).Updated 10/2024
Literature Information.Author: Sunday Osaizua Omeike, Sarafadeen Olateju Kareem, Hemraj Nandanwar, Adebayo Aliyu Lasisi, Flora Oluwafemi & Manoj Jangra 2020
Literature Information.Reference: Arabian Journal for Science and Engineering published Oct 20
Literature Information.Title: Purification, De Novo Characterization and Antibacterial Properties of a Novel, Narrow-Spectrum Bacteriostatic Tripeptide from Geotrichum candidum OMON-1
